incidents.name: Elevated 63040 Errors with Whatsapp Channel Verification Creations

incident_updates.body: On October 17th from 22:35 and until October 18th 00:08 UTC, Verify returned an elevated number of 63040 error codes on the creation of verifications with the WhatsApp channel. The issue has now been resolved

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Failures From Twilio Mexican Long Codes to AT&T Network in Mexico

incident_updates.body: We have identified that this incident is directly related with some country regulations that we’ve implemented. This has already been added to our SMS Guidelines for this destination, and will be communicated to our impacted customers soon. Therefore, we’re now resolving the Status post.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Long Code, North America

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience SMS delivery failures when sending messages from Twilio Mexican Long Codes to the AT&T network in Mexico for non-OTP messages and OTP messages containing a subset of UCS2 characters. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

The issue affecting multiple KORE systems, specifically impacting user experiences on the KORE Console, and Billing has been identified.The issue has no impact on connectivity. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Beginning at 00:00 am PT time, we were notified of a potential outage affecting multiple KORE systems, specifically impacting user experiences on the KORE Console, and Billing. This disruption means users may experience difficulties logging into the KORE Console (https://console.korewireless.com/) and may be restricted from linking or verifying accounts in the console. Additionally, viewing invoices will be restricted for those with linked and verified accounts.
Importantly, this does not affect customer SIM management activities, which remain fully operational within the Twilio Console. However, customers will not see amounts billed for data usage when viewing Usage in Console or via the UsageRecords APIs for both Programmable Wireless and Super SIM until the incident is mitigated. There are no delays in reporting the amount of bytes used by these SIMs. The amounts billed will be updated once the incident is resolved and delayed records are processed. We will provide more information in 1 hour or as soon as more information is available.

incidents.name: Delays in Voice Insights Events and Metrics for SDKs

incident_updates.body: Twilio Voice Insights events and metrics for SDKs were degraded for about 2 hours between 2:00 AM and 4:08 AM Pacific Time on 10/13/2023. During this period of time customers may have experienced call summaries for client calls without details, such as browser info, client names etc.

incidents.name: Issues Navigating Between Subaccounts in Console

incident_updates.body: Issue with a subset of users not being able to navigate into subaccounts on the Twilio Console  has been resolved and the is operating normally at this time. If the issue persists customers should delete all time cache and cookies or try using the browser's incognito mode.

incidents.name: Submit Ticket Button is Missing in the New Help Center

incident_updates.body:
Engineering Team reviewed the issue and confirmed that this is working as per design. Below are the suggested guidelines from the Engineering Team: Login to Console> Go to Support Center (this will launch the new Help Center (if in the pilot)) > Search > Contact Support
The Contact support button is only seen after search by:
Selecting a Support Article (these are the links that do not have the :new-window: after the title, and to be scrolled till the bottom of the article).
Or, if there are no relevant search results, scrolling to the bottom of the search results page (users may need to click “view more” in the results to see it).
Users who are experiencing issues submitting requests through the new Help Center site should log out of Console, and then visit our existing site at https://help.twilio.com/submit to submit a report of their problems.

We've become aware of a potential issue with Twilio console where submit ticket button is missing in the New Help Center. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively continuing to investigate the issue. As a workaround, users can continue submitting the ticket here: https://help.twilio.com/submit. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information is available.

We've become aware of a potential issue with Twilio console where submit ticket button is missing in the New Help Center. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. As a workaround, users can continue submitting the ticket here: https://help.twilio.com/submit. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information is available.

incidents.name: Delays Creating Calls With Programmable Voice

incident_updates.body: We are no longer experiencing delays in creating calls with Programmable Voice. This incident has been resolved.

We observed delays in creating calls with Programmable Voice between 3:56 PM PST - 4:23 PM PST, and are now observing recovery. Our engineering team will continue to monitor the situation to ensure a full recovery, and we will provide another update in 30 minutes.
Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue Programmable Voice. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: On Call Engineers are Investigating an issue

incident_updates.body: We have fully investigated the Flex WebChat issue, and it was determined that the impact was limited to a small set of customers, who have been contacted individually to address any concerns. All systems are operational.
Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Flex WebChat. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.
